Class DBCtrl

   |

Classes extended from DBCtrl:

DBI

Located in File: Program_Root/dbi/dbctrl.class.php

Common SQL interface 
Applications communicate with SQL databases of different flavours
 transparently through this class.
  • Package - Database
  • Access - public

Method Detail

constructor DBCtrl

void constructor &DBCtrl ( $dbname, $host, $user, $passwd )

Set up a database connection or reuse an existing one.
Function Parameters:
- string $dbname: dbname Name of the database to connect to.
- string $host: host Host which to connect.
- string $user: user User name.
- string $passwd: passwd Password.
Function Info:
Access - public

delete

db_result &delete ( $table, [$where = ''] )

Remove row(s) from a table. 
This function generates a query of the form
 "DELETE FROM $table WHERE $where".
Function Parameters:
- string $table: table Table name.
- string $where: where WHERE clause without WHERE keyword.
Function Info:
Access - public

insert

db_result &insert ( $table, $set )

insert a new row. 
This function generates a query of the form
 "UPDATE $table SET $set WHERE $where".
Function Parameters:
- string 2: where WHERE clause without WHERE keyword.
- string $table: table Table name.
- string $set: set Field set without SET clause.
Function Info:
Access - public

select

db_result &select ( $what, $table, [$where = ''], [$tail = ''] )

Select a result set from database. 
This function generates a query of the form
 "SELECT $what FROM $table WHERE $where $tail".
Function Parameters:
- string 4: tail Tail to SQL query.
- string $what: dbname Name of the database to connect to.
- string $table: what Field name or comma separated list of field names. an asterisk '*' selects all fields.
- string $where: table Table name to select from.
- string $tail: where WHERE clause without WHERE keyword.
Function Info:
Access - public

set_table_prefix

void set_table_prefix ( $prefix )

Set prefix for all table names used afterwards.
Function Parameters:
- string $prefix: table Table name.
Function Info:
Access - public

table_prefix

string table_prefix ( [$table = ''] )

Get table prefix used for all table names.
Function Parameters:
Function Info:
Access - public

update

db_result &update ( $table, $set, $where )

Update rows in a table. 
This function generates a query of the form
 "UPDATE $table SET $set WHERE $where".
Function Parameters:
- string $table: table Table name.
- string $set: set Field set without SET clause.
- string $where: where WHERE clause without WHERE keyword.
Function Info:
Access - public
